details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
30-35 sq. m. as topcoat
* per 4-Liters at 1.7-1.4 mils DFT

details.name: Tinting
details.info: Will accept BOYSEN®® Latex Colors at a maximum level of 1/4 Liter per 4-Liter can. Take note that B‑1466 Hansa Yellow and B‑1407 Toluidine Red are for interior painting only.

details.name: Thinning Solvent
details.info: To keep its efficacy, BOYSEN®® BUG OFF™ paint should not be diluted nor mixed with any other paint.

details.name: Application
details.info: By brush or roller. Do not apply by spray.

details.name: Shelf Life
details.info:
3 years from the date of manufacture
*When kept unopened and stored in proper conditions
